titleStmt.title: Scarronnides, or, Virgile travestie a mock-poem, in imitation of the fourth book of Virgils Æneis in English, burlesque.
titleStmt.author: Cotton, Charles, 1630-1687.
Virgil. Aeneis Liber 4.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by E. Cotes for Henry Brome ...,

notesStmt.note: Attributed to Charles Cotton. Cf. Halkett & Laing (2nd ed.).
Reproduction of original in Huntington Library.
